intent_atoms.description: Extend the stsd sample description parser to extract codec-specific fields such as avcC, hvcC, and encrypted variants when future tasks define required metadata surface.
Parser must correctly extract codec-specific fields for supported codecs once metadata surface is defined.
Evaluate additional handler type categorizations in the hdlr parser if future boxes require specialized roles beyond current mapping set.
Handler type categorization should accommodate new specialized roles as identified.
Schedule and execute macOS CLI/UI large-file benchmark using R4 protocol on dedicated hardware runners.
Benchmark results must be captured and documented once macOS automation with Instruments support is available.
Execute macOS DocC generation, notarization, TestFlight export, and hardware-dependent QA following release readiness runbook.
All steps of the release readiness runbook must be completed and documented once macOS infrastructure is available.
Run random slice benchmark suite on macOS hardware to compare mapped vs. chunked readers under identical workloads using Combine support.
Benchmark results should show comparable performance metrics between mapped and chunked readers when Combine is available.
Run ParseTreeStreamingSelectionAutomationTests on macOS with XCTest UI to validate SwiftUI automation flow for streaming selection.
Automation tests must pass and confirm end-to-end SwiftUI flow works as introduced.
Execute Combine-backed UI benchmark on macOS to capture latency metrics while maintaining CLI throughput parity.
Latency metrics should be captured and recorded with Combine support, ensuring throughput remains consistent with CLI harness.

functional_units.name: JSON Export Snapshot Tests
functional_units.description: Captures baseline snapshots of JSON export for representative fixtures

functional_units.name: stsd Sample Description Parser Extension
functional_units.description: Parses codec-specific fields such as avcC, hvcC and encrypted variants from stsd boxes

functional_units.name: hdlr Handler Type Categorization Evaluation
functional_units.description: Evaluates additional handler type categorizations for specialized roles in hdlr boxes

functional_units.name: macOS CLI/UI Large-File Performance Benchmark Execution
functional_units.description: Runs large-file benchmarks on macOS using the R4 protocol to measure performance of CLI and UI paths

functional_units.name: Release Readiness Validation Workflow
functional_units.description: Executes DocC generation, notarization, TestFlight export and hardware QA for release readiness

functional_units.name: Random Slice Benchmark Suite Execution
functional_units.description: Runs random slice benchmark suite on macOS to compare mapped vs. chunked readers

functional_units.name: ParseTree Streaming Selection Automation Tests
functional_units.description: Automates SwiftUI UI flow to validate end-to-end streaming selection in parse trees

functional_units.name: Combine-Backed UI Benchmark Execution
functional_units.description: Captures latency metrics for Combine-backed UI benchmarks on macOS
